title: "REDMAGIC 7 confirmed to feature independent gaming chip called Red Core 1"
excerpt: "REDMAGIC says that the chip was developed jointly with Awinic and JD Esports. Awinic is a Shanghai-based company that specialized in high-quality, high-performance analog, digital-analog mixed-signal, RF, and IC for mobile phones, AI, IoT, and the like."
